name: Compass (Johannes Knop)
description:
A mobile party game for Android 7(Nougat) or higher, where you and your friends take turns to guess in which direction a place is - in the real World! Requires Location access and internet connection.

Features:

  • Minimalist theme so you can feel sophisticated
  • no sounds because I didn't have time lol
  • Dark Mode, in case you're playing it in a dark bar environment
  • North Mode, helps a lot when you're really disoriented

You will have to enable installing unknown-sourced APKs and allow it to use your location, because that's what the game is about.
It's not a Virus, trust me ;)

Developed in a couple days during Schmiede Hallein '19 by me, after an idea Felix S. had :D
